name: Chicken/Pork/Beef Noodles
description: spicy noodles with spring onions served with chicken/pork/beef.

name: Shrimp Chow Mein
description: Dish made using egg noodles, juicy shrimp (prawns), and a few veggies and sauces.

name: Beef Noodle Soup
description: Hot dough noodles with beef meat and broth.

name: Minced Pork Over Noodle
description: Noodles served with spiced pork meat and soy sauce.

name: Combo Chow Fun
description: Flat rice noodles, called hor fun (or ho fun noodles), that are stir fried with beans sprouts and other vegetables, meat, chicken, or seafood, and dressed in a sweet and savory brown sauce.

name: Shrimp Fried Rice
description: Made with rice, shrimp, peas, carrots, onion, and egg, plus savory Asian flavors.

name: Roast Pork Fried Rice
description: Rice fried in olive oil with roasted pork meat cooked in soy sauce and garlic.

name: Salted Vegetable Fried Race
description: Fried rice with carrot,onion,coriander and other vegetables.

name: Egg Tomato Fried Rice
description: Fried rice served with mashed egg and tomato
